import React,{useContext, useState}from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import Link from react-router-dom import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const Navbar = () => { const [menu, setMenu]= useState("null"); const {getTotalCartItems}=useContext(ShopContext); return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men{menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) } export default Navbar
